data.title: HWI Swim Team
data.text:
About

The Harry Wright swim team was formed in 1976 by the late Captain Harry Wright, and is affiliated to the Hong Kong Amateur Swimming Association. It is organized and coached by the staff of Harry Wright International Limited, who specialize exclusively in swimming. We have various squads - please contact us for more information on each squad, and/or for a trial session.

The Harry Wright Swim Team offers training to children interested in competitive swimming at:

West Island School, 250 Victoria Rd, Pokfulam

South China Athletic Association, Caroline Hill Rd, Causeway Bay

Discovery Bay

Structure

The squad structure is designed to be progressive for swimmers to develop through various different pathways in line with LTAD.

Squad Criteria will be in place to ensure that squad selections are not only fair but correct for individual swimmers physiological development.

Various different locations are available for convenience across the younger squads, however convenience should not compromise a swimmer reaching their long term potential and achieving their dream.

Squad Information

Performance Squad (PS)

Competitive Squad (CS)

Gold Squad (GS)

Silver Squad (SS)

Bronze Squad (BS)

Learn to Swim

Club Training Squad (CTS)

Squad Schedules - please refer to Home Page for latest schedule

- WIS

- SCAA
